actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goliath makes two attacks with either its battleaxe or javelin.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weap on Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 feet, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stone’s Endurance
actions.desc: If the goliath takes damage and remains above 0 hit points, it can make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken. On a success, it gains 5 temporary hit points.
